marklogic.body: I don't know why the "Stand Your Ground Law" or the "Castle Doctrine Law" is being dragged into that Florida case concerning that Zimmerman that shot that Martin kid because Zimmerman was told by a 911 operator not to follow that Martin kid.If that Zimmerman disregarded the advice of the 911 operator and through his delusions played "police officer" then that's his psychological failing and must not be blamed on the "Stand Your Ground Law" because it's the "Stand Your Ground Law",not the "Follow them even though 911 operator told you not to do so then shoot them in Cold blood" Law.You people allow the media to marginalize and obscure the facts and sensationalize everything else and then you can't understand why we as Americans are losing all of our civil rights and most of all losing the right to defend ourselves?Why is it that the news media isn't harping about the fact that Zimmerman's parents work for the Florida courts which is probably why Zimmerman hasn't been arrested and charged for what he did? How can Zimmerman be allowed to claim self defense when he followed that Martin kid?And most of all how is it that Zimmerman has a pistol carry permit/was in possession of a firearm when Zimmerman has convictions for assault on a police officer and for domestic violence?You people go all crazy and Off the wall calling for good laws to be repealed instead of insisting that the news media stick to the facts and holding the news media accountable when the news media lies to us in spite of the facts and that's why we keep losing more and more of our civil rights as a result.When in the hell are you people going to wake up to reality and stop letting the media think and make decisions for you?There was a time when the news media valued and safe guarded the public trust that we American bestowed upon the news media but those days are long gone because the news media now only cares about the "bottom-line" and influencing government policy to favor their stock holders and those that they're beholden to.
